title: A sparing restraint, of many lauishe vntruthes, which M. Doctor Harding do the chalenge, in the first article of my Lorde of Sarisburies replie. By Edward Dering student in Diuinitie. With an answere vnto that long, and vncourteous epistle, entituled to M. Juel, and set before M. Hardings Reioinder
author: Dering, Edward, 1540?-1576.
publicationStmtPublisher: By Henry Denham, for Humfrey Toy, dwelling in Poules Church yarde, at the signe of the Helmet,
